skins.selfIntroduction: I'm Hiryuu, a Souryuu-class aircraft carrier. Although I'm Souryuu"s sister, we're not actually the same type. As an aircraft carrier, I simply can't afford to let my guard down during battles. Let's advance carefully, and aim for the best possible results in combat!
skins.acquisition: Aircraft carrier, Hiryuu, awaiting orders! Leave the missions to me. I’ll fight until my dying breath.
skins.secretaryIdle1: All systems go! Ready to sortie at any time.
skins.secretaryIdle2: Is it strange... that I find Souryuu’s ankle to be elegant?
skins.secretaryIdle3: Commander, if you’re bored, how about we spar?
skins.secretaryTouch: Be careful. You might get hurt if you get too close!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Commander, before I smack you, I’d like to ask: Do you not see me as a woman?

skins.shipDescription: Retrofit complete! Aircraft Carrier Hiryuu, reporting for duty! Hahaha! I finally got the chance to use that line! I'll be counting on you once more!
skins.acquisition: Retrofit complete! Aircraft Carrier Hiryuu, reporting for duty! Hahaha! I finally got the chance to use that line! I'll be counting on you once more!
skins.login: Calm down, Hiryuu, calm down... Oh, Commander? When'd you get here?
skins.details: I'm glad that everyone is saying that I look cooler, but...
skins.secretaryIdle1: I want to become as calm and collected as Souryuu, but it's no easy feat...
skins.secretaryIdle2: Hehe, if the two of us were to square off right now, who do you think would win?
skins.secretaryIdle3: It would be great to sortie with Souryuu. I'm not gonna lose again!
skins.secretaryTouch: Ugh... I have to slowly get used to your behavior patterns...
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: Hiyah! Commander, are you here for some punishment too?

skins.shipDescription: The disciplinary committee wouldn't exist if there weren't bad chicks like me! C'mon, let's totally own this school before my sister catches us!
skins.acquisition: The disciplinary committee wouldn't exist if there weren't bad chicks like me! C'mon, let's totally own this school before my sister catches us!
skins.login: There's a fairy hiding in the library, you say? If she's confined to the library all the time, do you think she's being bullied...?!
skins.details: I'm supposed to be a bully, but how exactly do you do that...?
skins.secretaryIdle1: Playing hooky? I don't think it's right to abandon your duties as a student. F-fighting? Picking on others is even worse!
skins.secretaryIdle3: How am I supposed to become the bad girl counterpart to rival my sister...? I just don't get it...
skins.secretaryTouch: My club looks pretty scary, right?
